description: New Delhi: Bhartiya Janta Party on Saturday accused CPM of hacking a BJP worker Vishnu, and his mother to death in Kerala. BJP Chief Amit Shah via a series of Tweets said, “CPM workers hacke
title: CPM workers hacked BJP worker Vishnu to death in Kerala: Amit Shah
title_page: CPM workers hacked BJP worker Vishnu to death in Kerala: Amit Shah
text:
CPM workers hacked our karyakarta Vishnu,young Dalit boy from Trivandrum,to death. They didn’t even spare his mother & aunt, both critical. pic.twitter.com/9Ma5hPPlbK
— Amit Shah (@AmitShah) October 8, 2016
BJP’s Kerala unit is holding a protest against this institutional killing of BJP workers in Kerala. CM Pinarayi Vijayan must ensure justice.
— Amit Shah (@AmitShah) October 8, 2016
The BJP stands with Vishnu’s family in this hour of grief. I have asked the state unit to provide all possible assistance to the family.
— Amit Shah (@AmitShah) October 8, 2016
Shah also said that BJP’s Kerala unit is holding protests against the “killing of BJP workers in the state and sought justice from the Chief Minister of the state, Pinarayi Vijayan.Shah also ensured all possible aid to the family of the deceased. He said, “The BJP stands with Vishnu’s family in this hour of grief. I have asked the state unit to provide all possible assistance to the family”.
